title: The Eternal Dominion
subtitle: Death is Only the Beginning
description: Command the legions of the dead as the Lich King rises to claim dominion over all living things. Build your undead empire from fallen kingdoms and march inexorably toward total domination of the mortal realm.
shortDescription: Rise as the Lich King and conquer the living with your undead legions.

story.synopsis: The Lich King Malachar has awoken from his millennia-long slumber. With necromantic power beyond measure, he raises armies from the very battlefields he conquers. The living will serve him - in death.
story.prologue: In ancient times, the necromancer Malachar sought to end death itself. He succeeded - but at a terrible cost. Now neither alive nor dead, he exists as the Lich King, bound to an eternity of undeath. For a thousand years he waited in his frozen tomb. Now the seals weaken, and Malachar rises to finish what he began - the unification of all souls under his dominion.
story.epilogue: The mortal kingdoms have fallen. Every corpse rises to serve. Every battlefield yields fresh recruits. The Lich King's dominion spreads like a plague across the land. And yet... Malachar feels something he has not felt in a millennium. With unlimited power at his command, he begins to remember what it meant to be human.
story.setting: The Blighted Lands and the kingdoms of the living
